itemDescription: British diplomat and Olympic field hockey player (1927-2015)

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Derek Malcolm Day  (29 November 1927 – 7 March 2015) was a British diplomat and field hockey player who competed in the 1952 Summer Olympics. He was educated at Hurstpierpoint College and St Catharine's College, Cambridge.
